main.name: Elvis Gonzalez
main.description: Techie and Foodie by heart, located in historic Charleston, SC. I am passionate about improving, learning, and teaching code!
main.bio: I love learning new things, teaching others, and sealife! üê¢ I am most comfortable in a JavaScript environment but did my college studies using Java/Visual Basic. I am currently working with Atlas Technologies, Inc as a Software Tester. Working for Atlas has given me a flexible opportunity that has allowed me to learn a variety of things in a fairly short amount of time. I am also enrolled into Lambda School, a full stack immersive, in order to fill gaps in my knowledge and stay on top of new and developing technologies!
main.contactmessage: Thanks for checking out my resume!

Focus was on Computer Programming and OOP using Java, Visual Basic, and Android Studio

work.description: Created Experiences for Guests, Learned how To be part of a team, Tested critical thinking and throughput. I am including this because it's an experience like no other, and i'm glad to have had the opportunity.
